newsitem.title: ESTONIA: FOREKS APRIL PROFIT 8.6 MLN KROONS.
newsitem.headline: FOREKS APRIL PROFIT 8.6 MLN KROONS.

text.p: Forekspank's net profit in April was 8.6 million kroons compared to 8.99 million kroons in March, it said on Tuesday.
Forekspank's profit is 37.6 million kroons in the first four months of 1997, it added in a statement.

Out of the total revenues in April, net interest revenues accounted for 30 percent, commissions 27 percent, revenues from forex operations 24 percent, investment revenues 18 percent and one percent others.
Compared to March, the stake of forex operations and investment revenues increased and that of commissions and net interest revenue fell.
Forekspank's assets decreased by 48 million kroons or 2.8 percent in April, which was mainly due to a 10.5 percent fall in demand deposits.
